title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux labs for SQL Server

courses.title: Installing and configuring Microsoft SQL Server on Red Hat Enterprise Linux using Ansible
courses.description: Goal: Users will be able to use Ansible playbooks to install and configure Microsoft SQL Server on Red Hat Enterprise Linux

courses.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux Crypto Policy and Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) With SQL Server
courses.description: Goal: Users will be able to use Microsoft SQL Server with RHEL system-wide crypto policies and configure TDE

courses.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux With SQL Server Columnstores
courses.description: Goal: Users will be able to use Microsoft SQL Server Columnstores with RHEL tuned profiles

courses.title: Terminal Session Recording and SQL Server Auditing
courses.description: Goal: After completing this scenario, users will be able to enable review recorded sessions in Red Hat Enterprise Linux, and track activity inside SQL Server using it's auditing feature.
